Patients stratify accord stage disease ( stage IIIB v stage IV v recurrent progressive surgery and/or radiotherapy ) , performance status ( 0-1 v 2 ) , age ( 70 vs 70 ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I receive paclitaxel IV 3 hour day 1 course . Arm II receive paclitaxel Arm I , follow carboplatin IV 1 hour . Treatment repeat every 21 day 6 course absence tumor progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assessment conduct treatment 2 , 6 , 9 , 12 month .
